name: ULTIMATE SUPER EPIC FUN SHAPE THROWING SIMULATOR 2018: AMAZINGLY FABULOUS SUPER FANTASTIC COOL EDITION
name_original: ULTIMATE SUPER EPIC FUN SHAPE THROWING SIMULATOR 2018: AMAZINGLY FABULOUS SUPER FANTASTIC COOL EDITION
description:
README:

Controls:

WASD - Move

Left Click - Throw shapes

Numbers - Select shape

E - Shop

Escape - Back to title screen and options

'Notvery interesting.  -- oliver1803: Maker of the game itself

ULTIMATE SUPER EPIC FUN SHAPE THROWING SIMULATOR 2018: AMAZINGLY FABULOUS SUPER FANTASTIC COOL EDITION (or Shape Throwing Simulator for short) is a game where you throw shapes. Wow, very exciting, much wow.

Knock over crates by throwing shapes at them. Unlock new shapes and upgrades by throwing.
